hero.title: Your digital identity ‚Äî secure, private, always with you
hero.subtitle: EguWallet is a European eIDAS 2.0 certified digital wallet that replaces physical documents with verifiable digital equivalents, recognised across all EU member states.

what.heading: What is EguWallet?
what.card1Body: EguWallet is built on Regulation (EU) 2024/1183 ‚Äî the eIDAS revision ‚Äî which guarantees every European citizen the right to a free digital wallet, recognised across all 27 member states.
what.card2Body: A European Digital Identity Wallet (EUDI) is a secure app that stores verifiable digital identity documents: ID card, passport, driving licence, vehicle documents and more ‚Äî all under your exclusive control.
what.card3Body: EguWallet is developed by IT Eguilde SRL, a digital identity provider. The app is built on the EUDI Architecture Reference Framework (ARF 2.5+), OpenID4VCI and OpenID4VP standards. It is currently undergoing formal eIDAS 2.0 certification ‚Äî until certification is complete, it operates as a pilot EUDI Wallet.

privacy.heading: Your data, your control
privacy.subheading: Selective disclosure ‚Äî only what is needed, only when you agree
privacy.body: EguWallet uses SD-JWT (Selective Disclosure JWT) and mDoc/ISO 18013-5 to enable selective data disclosure. When a merchant or institution requests identity verification, you choose exactly which data is transmitted. Nothing more.
privacy.example1Step4: Merchant does NOT receive: name, ID number, address, photo
privacy.legal1: GDPR Art. 5(1)(c) ‚Äî data minimisation principle: processing is limited to what is strictly necessary.
privacy.legal2: Reg. (EU) 2024/1183 ‚Äî selective presentation is a citizen right, not an optional feature.
privacy.legal3: No presentation is stored by the wallet or any third party ‚Äî every disclosure is ephemeral.

useCases.heading: Real-world use cases
useCases.subheading: EguWallet works across every area of public and private life ‚Äî from a routine traffic stop to signing a business contract

categories.title: Law Enforcement & Public Order
categories.description: Police officers, border guards, and public order inspectors verify digital identity in seconds ‚Äî with full cryptographic trust, without touching physical documents.

scenarios.name: Identity Check on Patrol
scenarios.body: A police officer verifies a citizen's full identity ‚Äî name, CNP, address, photo ‚Äî via NFC or QR. No paper. Result logged automatically.

scenarios.name: Complete Traffic Stop Package
scenarios.body: One QR scan: officer receives ID, driving licence with categories, vehicle registration, RCA insurance and ITP ‚Äî all cryptographically verified.

scenarios.name: Border Control
scenarios.body: At border crossing points, officers verify identity, nationality and travel document validity in one secure digital presentation.

categories.title: Business & Commercial Transactions
categories.description: Companies, notaries, lawyers and B2B platforms verify company identity and legal representative authority instantly ‚Äî eliminating paper certificates and couriers.

scenarios.name: Company Verification (ONRC)
scenarios.body: A B2B platform or public tender portal verifies company name, CUI, registered address and active status ‚Äî all certified by the National Trade Registry.

scenarios.name: Legal Representative Verification
scenarios.body: A partner or notary verifies that a person is an authorised representative of a company ‚Äî identity + company credential + mandate presented simultaneously.

scenarios.name: Contract Signing ‚Äî Full Automated Flow
scenarios.body: One QR: identity verified, mandate confirmed, contract signed with a Qualified Electronic Signature. Legally binding across the entire EU. Under 90 seconds.

categories.title: Education ‚Äî School & University
categories.description: Students from age 6 to doctorate carry their school or university card in EguWallet. Used for school entry, exams, library, cafeteria, dormitories and transport discounts.

scenarios.name: School Student Card (Classes 1‚Äì12)
scenarios.body: A pupil taps their phone at the school gate, library or cafeteria. The digital carnet de elev is issued by the school or inspectorate ‚Äî valid for the academic year.

scenarios.name: Student Card + ID at Exams
scenarios.body: For the baccalaureat, national exams and olympiads: carnet de elev plus electronic ID card presented simultaneously ‚Äî for students 14 and older.

scenarios.name: University Student Card
scenarios.body: Faculty entry, dormitory, library, secretariat ‚Äî the digital carnet de student replaces the physical card. Works for scholarships and CFR travel discounts.

scenarios.name: Student Transport Pass
scenarios.body: Pupils and students board buses, metro and trains using their wallet. The validator or driver sees the entitlement instantly ‚Äî no physical pass needed.

categories.title: Retail & Age Verification
categories.description: Merchants verify age or identity at point of sale in seconds ‚Äî with zero personal data stored and full GDPR compliance.

scenarios.name: Age 18+ at Point of Sale
scenarios.body: Cashier shows a QR code. Customer approves from their wallet: only ¬´age ‚â• 18: YES¬ª is transmitted. No name, no ID number, no photo.

scenarios.name: Hotel Check-In
scenarios.body: Tourist checks in by presenting name, date of birth and nationality from the wallet. No photocopying passports. Compliant with accommodation registration regulations.

categories.title: Financial Services & KYC
categories.description: Banks, insurance companies and fintech platforms onboard customers digitally ‚Äî meeting AML/KYC requirements without paper forms.

scenarios.name: Bank Account Opening (KYC/AML)
scenarios.body: A bank verifies the customer's full identity remotely ‚Äî name, CNP, date and place of birth, nationality, address ‚Äî certified by the EUDI wallet. Compliant with anti-money-laundering law.

scenarios.name: Insurance & Financial Products
scenarios.body: Insurance companies verify policyholder identity at contract signing ‚Äî digitally, instantly, with full eIDAS 2.0 traceability.

categories.title: Healthcare & Social Services
categories.description: Hospitals, clinics, pharmacies and social services identify patients and beneficiaries securely, without manual form-filling.

scenarios.name: Patient Identification
scenarios.body: A hospital or clinic identifies a patient with their EguWallet. Name, CNP, date of birth verified instantly at reception or in the emergency room.

scenarios.name: Electoral Commission Voter Check
scenarios.body: Polling station staff verify voter identity and cross-check the electoral register ‚Äî instantly, with full audit trail. No manual list lookup.

scenarios.name: Hiring & HR Verification
scenarios.body: Employers verify new hire identity at contract signing ‚Äî name, CNP, address ‚Äî as required by the Labour Code and REVISAL reporting.

categories.title: Gambling & Self-Exclusion
categories.description: Online and physical casinos, sports betting operators and gaming platforms verify player identity and check national self-exclusion registers ‚Äî preventing problem gambling and ensuring regulatory compliance.

scenarios.name: Player Identity Verification (KYC)
scenarios.body: Gambling operators verify player identity at registration ‚Äî name, date of birth, nationality ‚Äî as required by AML and gambling licensing regulations. Fast, digital, no photocopies.

scenarios.name: Self-Exclusion Register Check
scenarios.body: Before allowing a player to bet, the operator checks the national self-exclusion register via EguWallet. If the player is on the list, access is blocked automatically ‚Äî no manual lookup required.

scenarios.name: Age 18+ Verification for Gaming
scenarios.body: Online and physical gaming operators verify that the player is 18 or older ‚Äî using the EguWallet age attestation. Only YES/NO is transmitted ‚Äî no personal data stored by the operator.

categories.title: Legal & Notarial ‚Äî Physical Presence No Longer Required
categories.description: Under Regulation (EU) 2024/1183, the EUDI Wallet provides legally binding identification equivalent to physical presence for a wide range of legal acts. Many notarial procedures that previously required citizens to physically appear can now be completed remotely ‚Äî a major leap forward for digital public services.

scenarios.name: Remote Notarial Identification
scenarios.body: For acts that previously required physical appearance ‚Äî power of attorney, declarations, property transfers ‚Äî the notary can now identify the party via the EUDI wallet remotely. The wallet's verified PID replaces in-person document inspection.

scenarios.name: Real Estate Transactions Without Queuing
scenarios.body: Buying or selling property no longer requires travelling to a notary's office just for identification. Both parties identify digitally, the representative's mandate is verified, and the contract is signed with a QES ‚Äî all remotely.

scenarios.name: Declarations & Powers of Attorney
scenarios.body: Statutory declarations, mandates, affidavits ‚Äî these acts no longer require a physical notary appointment for the identification step. The citizen presents their EguWallet PID; identification is legally equivalent to in-person verification.

scenarios.name: Company & Commercial Contracts with QES
scenarios.body: Service agreements, partnership contracts, shareholder resolutions ‚Äî signed with a Qualified Electronic Signature directly from EguWallet. Legal force in all 27 EU member states. No printer, no courier, no appointment.

trust.heading: Legally binding ‚Äî trusted by law, controlled by you
trust.subheading: EguWallet gives citizens full control over their identity data, while giving services and public authorities the legal certainty they need.
citizenPoints: You choose what data to share, with whom, and when ‚Äî your wallet never transmits anything without your explicit approval.
Every interaction is logged in your personal audit history. You can see exactly who requested your data and what they received.
Under GDPR Art. 17, you can request deletion of your data from any service at any time ‚Äî directly from the app.
Your cryptographic keys never leave your device. No wallet provider, no government, no third party can access your credentials without your consent.
trust.rpTitle: For services and organisations ‚Äî legally certain identity
trust.rpSubtitle: Services that accept EguWallet (called Relying Parties ‚Äî the businesses, institutions or public authorities that verify identity) benefit from:
rpPoints: Legally binding identification under Regulation (EU) 2024/1183 ‚Äî equivalent to physical document inspection for most legal purposes.
Cryptographically verified identity data ‚Äî impossible to forge, replay or tamper with.
Full AML/KYC compliance for banks, insurance companies and financial platforms.
Zero liability risk ‚Äî the wallet issuer bears regulatory responsibility for credential authenticity.
trust.auditBody: EguWallet is built on open standards (ARF 2.5+, OpenID4VCI, OpenID4VP, SD-JWT, ISO 18013-5) and is undergoing formal certification by an accredited Conformity Assessment Body. Our technical architecture is open to independent security audits. We are compliant with eIDAS 2.0 for public authorities, while remaining flexible for private sector integrations across retail, healthcare, finance and legal services.

integrate.heading: Integrate EguWallet into your service
integrate.subheading: Open SDKs and APIs ‚Äî add trusted digital identity to your website or app in hours, not months
integrate.card1Body: Drop-in JavaScript SDK for websites and REST/native SDKs for Android and iOS. Add a ¬´Verify with EguWallet¬ª button to your service ‚Äî identity data arrives cryptographically signed, no manual verification needed.
integrate.card2Body: Relying parties must register with the national node. Until the Romanian national node is live, integration with EguWallet automatically covers registration through our own LOTL and certification services ‚Äî removing the compliance hurdle entirely.
integrate.card3Body: Age verification, KYC/AML onboarding, self-exclusion checks, qualified electronic signature ‚Äî all available through a single integration. Our SDK handles the OpenID4VP presentation flow, selective disclosure and audit logging for you.

future.heading: What's next ‚Äî the future of digital identity
future.subheading: EguWallet continuously expands with new use cases that make life easier

items.title: Device-to-Device Verification (Bluetooth)
items.body: Like contactless NFC payment ‚Äî a police officer or merchant brings their phone near yours and instantly receives only the data you have authorised. No internet, no intermediate server.

items.title: Law Enforcement Identity Check
items.body: Similar to modern contactless payment: a law enforcement officer verifies identity via NFC/Bluetooth. You control what data is transmitted. Fast, secure, no photocopies needed.

items.title: Age 18+ Verification (Coming Soon)
items.body: Imminent deployment with a major Romanian retailer for age control on alcohol sales. The merchant receives only a YES/NO answer ‚Äî no other personal data is disclosed.

items.body: Students entitled to free travel prove their status via EguWallet. Regular passengers purchase and present tickets digitally ‚Äî no paper, no contact validators.

items.title: Address on the New Romanian ID Card
items.body: The new Romanian ID card no longer contains an address on the chip. EguWallet solves this: your registered address, certified by the official registry, can be selectively disclosed when required.

items.title: Qualified Digital Signature
items.body: EguWallet will function as a Qualified Electronic Signature (QES) device compliant with eIDAS 2.0. Sign documents with full legal force, recognised across all EU member states ‚Äî directly from your phone.

howItWorks.heading: How it works
howItWorks.step1Body: Install EguWallet from the Google Play Store ‚Äî free for now during the pilot phase. Coming soon on Apple App Store.
howItWorks.step2Body: Verify your phone number, create a secure PIN, and connect to your county or city portal to register your digital documents.
howItWorks.step3Body: Scan a QR code, tap an NFC terminal or share a secure link. You choose exactly what data is transmitted ‚Äî never more than is necessary.

items.a: EguWallet is a European eIDAS 2.0 certified digital wallet developed by IT Eguilde SRL. It allows you to store and present digital identity documents (ID card, passport, driving licence etc.) securely on your phone, with full control over your personal data.

items.q: What documents can I store in EguWallet?
items.a: Currently: identity card (PID), passport and driving licence. Coming soon: vehicle registration, RCA insurance, ITP/RAR, company documents and property documents.

Yes. EguWallet uses SD-JWT and mDoc/ISO 18013-5 for selective disclosure ‚Äî you only transmit data you explicitly approve. No presentation is stored. Legal basis: GDPR Art. 5(1)(c) and Regulation (EU) 2024/1183.
Today: Ilfov County Council digital services (ilfov.net) and Sector 2 City Hall (sector2.eu). Expansion to other public institutions and private retailers in Romania and the EU is ongoing.

eIDAS 2.0 is Regulation (EU) 2024/1183 amending the original eIDAS regulation. It guarantees every European citizen the right to a free digital wallet (EUDI Wallet), recognised across all 27 member states.

When a service requests identity verification, your wallet shows you exactly what data is being requested. You approve or reject each field. For example, for age-18 verification, the merchant receives only a YES/NO ‚Äî they never see your name, national ID number or address.

Yes, free for citizens during the current pilot phase. EguWallet is undergoing formal eIDAS 2.0 certification ‚Äî once certified, pricing for institutional integrations may apply, but the citizen wallet app will remain free.

EguWallet is currently undergoing formal eIDAS 2.0 certification by an accredited Conformity Assessment Body (CAB). Until certification is complete, it operates as a pilot EUDI Wallet. All technical standards (ARF 2.5+, OpenID4VCI, OpenID4VP, SD-JWT, ISO 18013-5) are already implemented.

items.q: How do I activate my digital wallet?
items.a: Download the app from Google Play, verify your phone number, create a PIN, then connect to your county or city portal to register your documents. The process takes approximately 5 minutes.

accountDelete.title: Delete Your Account
accountDelete.description: Request deletion of your EguWallet account and all associated data.
accountDelete.intro: EguWallet respects your right to data erasure under GDPR Article 17. You can delete your wallet and all associated data using any of the methods below.
method1Steps: Open the EguWallet app on your device
accountDelete.method1Note: This immediately removes all credentials, cryptographic keys, and local data from your device, and requests deletion of your server-side account data.
accountDelete.method2Text: Send an email to privacy@eguwallet.eu with the subject line 'Account Deletion Request'. Include the email address or phone number associated with your wallet registration.
deletedItems: Your wallet registration data (name, email, phone number)
All digital credentials (PID, mDL, qualified attestations)
Device information and FCM push notification tokens
retainedItems: eIDAS 2.0 mandatory audit logs (anonymised, no personal data) ‚Äî retained for 7 years as required by EU regulation
accountDelete.timelineText: Upon receiving your deletion request, your personal data will be permanently removed from our servers within 30 days. Local device data is deleted immediately when using in-app deletion.
accountDelete.contactText: For questions about data deletion or your privacy rights, contact us at privacy@eguwallet.eu.
